resources.string: This is a store description. This description can be very short (even nonexistent) or very long as in this example. This means that the layout should be designed in a such way that it can accept different text lengths.

This is a discount description. This description can be very short (even nonexistent) or very long as in this example. This means that the layout should be designed in a such way that it can accept different text lengths.
Are you sure you want to delete discount?
This in app product will enable you to see your discounts on the map, relative to your current possition. For more details, see image bellow.
